General.Name: The Good Flour Corp
General.Description: The Good Flour Corp. provides gluten-free and allergen free all-purpose baking flour blend. It also provides gluten and allergen free fried chicken batter, pancake and waffle blend, pizza and pasta mix, fish batter, tempura batter, bean cake, and other baked goods. The company was formerly known as LOOPShare Ltd. and changed its name to The Good Flour Corp. in November 2021.The Good Flour Corp. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 131 Water Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 4M3
